full_summary:
# TBIPS - One (1) Programmer/Analyst - Level 2 - Tier 1 

## Summary 

Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) arrangement to hire one (1) Level 2 Programmer/Analyst for a one (1) year term with potential extensions for up to three (3) additional years. The contract's expected start date is April 1, 2023.

## Description of Services 

The successful bidder will be responsible for:

* Elaboration and modification of Crystal Reports for LIMS-Plus
* Creation of MS SQL queries and Cognos BI reports
* Development and modification of existing VB.Net applications
* Recommendations and training on the use of Team Foundation Server
* Data mining and reporting activities

The work involves conducting peer reviews for IT quality assurance of internal products.

## Eligibility 

This RFP is restricted to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders (SA Holders) who have qualified under TBIPS Supply Arrangement #EN578-170432 Tier 1 in the National Capital Region.

## Current Contractor Information 

E Performance Inc. is currently performing the work under contract 7233148.

## Tender Requirements 

* RCMP Enhanced Reliability Status Clearance is required for the resources.
* Bidders may submit a proposal for one resource.
* Tender submissions must be received by February 22, 2023, at 14:00 ET.

## Contact Information 

Interested parties should submit inquiries to:
Megan McCoy
Phone: 343-549-1789
Email: Megan.McCoy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

## Submission Instructions 

Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified SA Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

Note: BIDDERS ARE ADVISED THAT “BUYANDSELL.GC.CA” IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DISTRIBUTION OF SOLICITATION DOCUMENTS.

THIS IS A TBIPS GSA PROCUREMENT GOVERNED BY THE TBIPS ARRANGEMENT (#EN578-170432). ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS SHOULD BE DIRECTED TO THE CONTRACTING AUTHORITY. (End of Notice)

## Documents 

The notice has been posted on Government of Canada Intergovernmental and Public Sector Research-Interfaced Development Space (IGRIS) Site under the procurement notice PW-23-01022841.
